#include <stdio.h>
#include <limits.h>
 
int main()
{
int a, b, c, d, e, m=INT_MAX;
int r[25];
int *p=r-1, *q=r+26;
scanf("%d %d %d %d %d",&a,&b,&c,&d,&e);

r[0]=a+b-c*d/e;
r[1]=a+b-c/d*e;
r[2]=a+b*c-d/e;
r[3]=a+b*c/d-e;
r[4]=a+b/c-d*e;
r[5]=a+b/c*d-e;
r[6]=a-b+c*d/e;
r[7]=a-b+c/d*e;
r[8]=a-b/c+d*e;
r[9]=a-b/c*d+e;
r[10]=a-b*c+d/e;
r[11]=a-b*c/d+e;
r[12]=a*b+c-d/e;
r[13]=a*b+c/d-e;
r[14]=a*b-c/d+e;
r[15]=a*b-c+d/e;
r[16]=a*b/c+d-e;
r[17]=a*b/c-d+e;
r[18]=a/b+c-d*e;
r[19]=a/b+c*d-e;
r[20]=a/b-c+d*e;
r[21]=a/b-c*d+e;
r[22]=a/b*c+d-e;
r[23]=a/b*c-d+e;

for(; ++p<q; m=m>*p&&*p>0?*p:m);
printf("%d\n",m);

return 0;
}
